mapper.update: update reply set groupId = #{groupId} where Replyno != #{groupId}
mapper.select: SELECT r.replyNo,r.COMMUNITYNUMBER,r.groupid,r.repclass,r.repcontent,r.REPDATE ,f.NICKNAME,p.PROFILEIMG FROM REPLY r,FLEAMARKETMEMBER f,CAPPLICAION c,PROFILE p WHERE c.COMMUNITYNUMBER = r.COMMUNITYNUMBER AND r.EMAIL = f.EMAIL AND f.EMAIL = p.EMAIL and r.COMMUNITYNUMBER = #{communityNumber} ORDER BY groupid ASC,groupOrderid ASC
SELECT NVL(max(groupOrderid),0) FROM REPLY WHERE groupid = #{groupId} AND repclass = 1
SELECT count(*) FROM REPLY WHERE COMMUNITYNUMBER = #{communityNumber}
